idea-plugin.name: Development Activity Recorder
idea-plugin.description:
A comprehensive development activity recorder for JetBrains IDEs that tracks and logs your coding activities.
Features: • Records file editing activities and code changes • Tracks terminal command execution • Monitors Git operations and version control activities • Provides a status bar widget to toggle recording on/off • Exports activity data for analysis and productivity insights
Perfect for developers who want to analyze their coding patterns, track productivity, or maintain detailed logs of their development workflow.
